title: John Brennan joins Chris Hayes to discuss the pardon of Michael Flynn
description: “This just sends a very bad signal, not only to Americans, but also to folks around the globe, that this type of activity and behavior is taking place in our government in 2020,” says former CIA Director John Brennan.

title: ‘The impact has been colossal’: Native American tribes hit especially hard by covid-19
description: Dr. Twyla Baker joins The ReidOut to talk about how Native American communities have been impacted by the ongoing pandemic, calling it ‘colossal.’

title: American exceptionalism sanitized the first Thanksgiving. Let's not mythologize Covid.

title: Supreme Court blocks New York Covid-19 restrictions on houses of worship
description: The Supreme Court, in a 5-4 decision, issued an injunction blocking New York Governor Andrew Cuomo's Covid-19 restrictions on occupancies in houses of worship and religious institutions.
